input.description:
String Value - Class name
HPSC Example: HPSC_ComputerSystem, HPSC_Contact
An XML document providing detail for one or more fields

output.description: An XML document providing detail for one or more fields and values

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output encoding="XML" indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <entity-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">network-device</xsl:text> </entity-type> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">update-network-device</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item> </xsl:if> </keys> <instance> <device> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="vendor"]/text() != '0'"> <vendor> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="vendor"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </vendor> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="parent-device"]/text() != '0'"> <parent-device> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="parent-device"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </parent-device> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="model"]/text() != '0'"> <model> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="model"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </model> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="serial-number"]/text() != '0'"> <serial-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="serial-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </serial-number> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="location"]/text() != '0'"> <location> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="location"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </location> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item-type"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="updated-by"]/text() != '0'"> <updated-by> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="updated-by"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </updated-by> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="contact-name"]/text() != '0'"> <contact-name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="contact-name"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </contact-name> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="part-number"]/text() != '0'"> <part-number> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="part-number"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </part-number> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="status"]/text() != '0'"> <status> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="status"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </status> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item-sub-type"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item-sub-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item-sub-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item-sub-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="location-code"]/text() != '0'"> <location-code> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="location-code"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </location-code> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="building"]/text() != '0'"> <building> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="building"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </building> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="floor"]/text() != '0'"> <floor> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="floor"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </floor> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="room"]/text() != '0'"> <room> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="room"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </room> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="system-down"]/text() != '0'"> <system-down> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="system-down"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Boolean</xsl:text> </type> </system-down> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="asset-tag"]/text() != '0'"> <asset-tag> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="asset-tag"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </asset-tag> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="critical"]/text() != '0'"> <critical> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="critical"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Boolean</xsl:text> </type> </critical> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="company"]/text() != '0'"> <company> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="company"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </company> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="department"]/text() != '0'"> <department> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="department"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </department> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="assignment-group"]/text() != '0'"> <assignment-group> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="assignment-group"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </assignment-group> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="addl-manufacturer"]/text() != '0'"> <addl> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <addl> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <addl-manufacturer> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="addl-manufacturer"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </addl-manufacturer> <addl-name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="addl-name"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </addl-name> <addl-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="addl-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </addl-type> <addl-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="addl-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </addl-description> </element> </addl> </addl> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="scan-date"]/text() != '0'"> <scans> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <scans> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <scan-date> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scan-date"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </scan-date> <scan-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scan-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </scan-type> <scan-version> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scan-version"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </scan-version> <scan-result> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="scan-result"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </scan-result> </element> </scans> </scans> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="support-contact-name"]/text() != '0'"> <support-contacts> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <support-contacts> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <support-contact-name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-name"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-name> <support-contact-reason> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-reason"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-reason> <support-contact-first> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-first"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-first> <support-contact-last> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-last"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-last> <support-contact-phone> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-phone"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-phone> <support-contact-email> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="support-contact-email"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </support-contact-email> </element> </support-contacts> </support-contacts> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="feature-id"]/text() != '0'"> <features> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <features> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <feature-id> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="feature-id"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </feature-id> <feature-size> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="feature-size"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </feature-size> <feature-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="feature-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </feature-description> </element> </features> </features> </xsl:if> </device> <network-device> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text() != '0'"> <configuration-item> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="configuration-item"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </configuration-item> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="driver-name"]/text() != '0'"> <drivers> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <drivers> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <driver-name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="driver-name"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </driver-name> <driver-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="driver-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </driver-type> <driver-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="driver-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </driver-description> <driver-version> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="driver-version"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </driver-version> </element> </drivers> </drivers> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="slot-no"]/text() != '0'"> <slots> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <slots> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <slot-no> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="slot-no"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </slot-no> <slot-protocol> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="slot-protocol"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </slot-protocol> <slot-inuse> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="slot-inuse"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Boolean</xsl:text> </type> </slot-inuse> <slot-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="slot-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </slot-description> </element> </slots> </slots> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-name"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="connection-ip-address"]/text() != '0' or //field[@name="connection-mac-address"]/text() != '0'"> <connections> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <connections> <element> <type> <xsl:text>Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-name"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-name"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-name> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-type"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-type> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-type"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-ip-address"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-ip-address> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-ip-address"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-ip-address> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-mac-address"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-mac-address> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-mac-address"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-mac-address> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-domain-suffix"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-domain-suffix> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-domain-suffix"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-domain-suffix> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-default-gateway"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-default-gateway> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-default-gateway"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-default-gateway> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-subnet-mask"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-subnet-mask> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-subnet-mask"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-subnet-mask> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-device-id"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-device-id> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-device-id"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-device-id> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-dhcp"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-dhcp> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-dhcp"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Boolean</xsl:text> </type> </connection-dhcp> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-description"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-description> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-description"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </connection-description> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-speed"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-speed> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-speed"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </connection-speed> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="connection-media-interface"]/text() != '0'"> <connection-media-interface> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="connection-media-interface"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text>Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </connection-media-interface> </xsl:if> </element> </connections> </connections> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="sysmodtime"]/text() != '0'"> <sysmodtime> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="sysmodtime"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">DateTime</xsl:text> </type> </sysmodtime> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="sysmoduser"]/text() != '0'"> <sysmoduser> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="sysmoduser"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </sysmoduser> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="sysmodcount"]/text() != '0'"> <sysmodcount> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="sysmodcount"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </sysmodcount> </xsl:if> </network-device> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
This workflow formats fields, and values into a given document structure (update-operation) identified by class name.
This workfllow is only used by HPSC.
